resources.string: - Track your run\n- Log your mood\n- Conquer your day!

"Stressed out and want to go for a run?
Use Runner\'s High to track your run and your mood at the same!
When starting a run workout, the app will ask you your mood. Then just run like normal. You can keep tabs on your progress with statistics and live location tracking. Once the run is completed, fill out your new mood and feel free to look back over your previous runs as well.
We hope this app treats you well, and enjoy your runs!
- Development Team"

array.name: Quotes
array.item: \"Shoot for the moon; if you miss you will die in outerspace, which is cool\"\n -Yekaterina Petrovna Zamolodchikova

array.name: tips
array.item: Stressed out? Try to sit down and take some deep breaths
If you\'re struggling, reach out to someone you trust for support
Pat yourself on the back for taking the opportunity to get out and get exercise today
Take a moment to appreciate all the progress you\'ve made recently
Give yourself the same forgiveness and unconditional love that you would give a friend or relative
Take some time to appreciate the world around you
